mapper.sql: ID, MEMBER_ID, TERMINAL_ID, MEMBER_REQ_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, BUSINESS_NO, NOTIFY_URL, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_AT, REMARKS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY
mapper.insert: /** FiCbPayMemberApiRqstMapper.insert **/ insert into FI_CBPAY_MEMBER_API_RQST ( ID, MEMBER_ID, TERMINAL_ID, MEMBER_REQ_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, BUSINESS_NO, NOTIFY_URL, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_AT, REMARKS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberReqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, NOW(), #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BAOFOO_FI.FI_CBPAY_MEMBER_API_RQST s WHERE s.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND s.MEMBER_REQ_ID = #{remitApplyNo} AND s.BUSINESS_TYPE='12'
mapper.update: UPDATE BAOFOO_FI.FI_CBPAY_MEMBER_API_RQST s SET s.BUSINESS_NO = #{proxyOrderId} WHERE s.MEMBER_REQ_ID = #{remitApplyNo} AND s.BUSINESS_TYPE='12'
